import "./App.css"; import { useState } from "react"; import Header from "./components/Header"; import Bookshelf from "./components/Bookshelf"; function App() { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); return (
{showSearchPage ? (
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} > Close
    ) : (

    Want to Read

    1. 1776
      David McCullough
    2. Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
      J.K. Rowling

    Read

    1. The Hobbit
      J.R.R. Tolkien
    2. Oh, the Places You'll Go!
      Seuss
    3. The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
      Mark Twain
    setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)}>Add a book
    )}
    ); } export default App;
